title: Womens Dress
title_original: Women’s 100% Pure Cashmere Sweater – Grade A Mongolian Cashmere, Soft Crew Neck Pullover for Women, Warm Classic Fit

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #396,174 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #3,423 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Pullovers

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cashmere sweater soft and of great quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Cashmere Sweater!!
items.body: I’m not one to normally leave reviews but this Hearth Cashmere sweater is my go to sweater and is so versatile! Perfect for dressing up for a day in the office or down for a casual look as well. Super soft and warm and i can tell its good quality, because it has very little pilling! 10/10 recommend Read more
items.author: Aryn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality.
items.body: Beautiful shade, warm and soft. Read more
items.author: Janet W.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect everyday cashmere sweater
items.body: I wasn’t sure what to expect, but this sweater is such a good find. The fit is spot on - I’m usually between sizes so I got a M - this sweater drapes really nicely without being clingy. The cashmere feels super soft and warm, but still light enough to wear indoors without overheating. It’s simple but looks really clean and polished, like something you’d find at a higher-end store. I’ve been reaching for it constantly since it arrived - perfect for socal winters and layering when I travel somewhere colder. Read more
items.author: mandy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my new favorite sweater!!!
items.body: I received this just in time for the cooler fall weather. The material is soft and comfortable without any "scratchy" feeling that most sweaters have. It is also warm without being too thick and bulky. The fit is true to size. It is very versatile; easy to dress up for work or for a more casual look. I never thought cashmere was affordable until I found this product. I will be gifting these sweaters to my friends for Christmas this year. I highly recommend! Read more
items.author: joy boyland

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant appearance without breaking the bank
items.body: Ordered the Ivory in a size Medium which turned out to be true to normal sizing. The seams are cleanly stitched and found absolutely no loose or frayed threads. The ivory color is very natural and should go with just about anything. The sweater fit my wife very nicely without clinging or bunching and it moved well with her. She only had her bra underneath and said that the sweater felt very soft without any of the ‘scratchy’ feeling that many wool sweaters have. The cashmere is a very fine cashmere (close-up pic) and does not have any goat-hair that I have sometimes seen in other cashmere garments. Besides the stitched on care label (pics), a care card is also included (pic). My wife is looking forward to wearing this more often with the cooler weather that has finally arrived. Read more
items.author: C. Ramsdale

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I sized up
items.body: I sized up to a large. I normally wear a medium but wanted the casual look the model has. This sweater is beautiful and so soft! It’s well made and fits a little loose as expected since I sized up. Read more
items.author: Susan

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Ivory, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
